job description:
Role Overview
  • Drive data science projects to completion, with a tenacious focus on the business impact of those projects. Pragmatically prioritize tasks to deliver on goals with a sense of urgency.
  • Solve tough analytical problems at any level in the organization, and be persistent in getting to the solution, whether it involves a deep learning data product or business analytics.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to plan and execute on data science projects.
  • Study hard; we deeply value learning as a continuous investment to better achieve our goals.
Responsibilities
  • Discover, explore, and create data science products to meet product and business objectives.
  • Conceive of and answer questions about our product ecosystem using observational data
  • Design, implement and launch experiments to test your hypotheses
  • Identify and implement metrics that align with company goals
  • Contribute to our Python codebase and perform analyses in R or another statistics tool of your choice
  • Advise coworkers on the(mis)use of statistics to understand data
  • Help define and then hire roles to build out a complete data science teamConceive of and answer questions about our product ecosystem using observational data.
Qualifications
  • B.S. in Math or Statistics
  • Experience using Python for Data Science
  • Skills: Machine Learning, Statistics, git
Bonus
  • M.S. or PhD in Math or related field
  • Auto Industry Experience
  • Consumer Facing App Experience
  • Deep learning(CNN, RNN)
  • R(the language)
  • Natural Language Processing
